name: Bristol & Bath Brussels Office
bossPosition: International Affairs Manager at the Bristol City Council
goal: The Bristol & Bath Brussels Office works with local partners, including Bristol City Council and the Universities of Bristol and Bath, to represent them in Europe.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Culture, Digital economy and society, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Institutional affairs, Migration and asylum, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Sport, Trade, Youth
euInitiatives: The Bristol & Bath Brussels Office follows a range of EU initiatives, policies and legislative files of relevance to its members including for example the development of the future Horizon Europe and Erasmus+ programmes.
